mean_en: the act of working with another person or group of people to create or produce something; a piece of work produced by two or more people or groups of people working together
sentence: They wrote a book in collaboration with each other.
sentence_trans: 他们合作写完了一本书。
word_etyma: col共同 + labor劳动 + ation名词后缀 → 共同劳动 → collaboration协作，合著
